short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The only smart scheduler built for customer-facing teams, ChiliCal helps reps book meetings faster.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Insert your availability in 0.5 seconds without using your mouse

Open up your calendar to high-priority customers: Allow customers to book over lower-priority time slots like 1:1s, training, or focus time

Reduce no-shows with custom reminders tailored to each customer and meeting type

Data to help you do your job better including meeting attempts, meetings scheduled per rep, and no-shows

Be prepared for every meeting with information about your customers at your fingertips

Record everything in your CRM including no shows, reschedules, and other meeting details

Download the Chrome extension and head to the Chili Piper website to get started for free!
